level.heading: Annual report by Mayor.
level.text: The mayor shall submit to the Council, no later than 6 months after the end of each fiscal year, a report on the financial condition of the fund and the results of the operation of the fund for the fiscal year.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 7-220
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-220, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 7-2001.
